abstract: The hedge fund run by John Paulson, who foresaw the distress in subprime mortgages and reaped billions by betting against the related securities, has bought about 168 million shares of Bank of America, according to a regulatory filing Wednesday.
snippet: The hedge fund run by John Paulson, who foresaw the distress in subprime mortgages and reaped billions by betting against the related securities, has bought about 168 million shares of Bank of America, according to a regulatory filing Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: The hedge fund run by John Paulson, who foresaw the distress in subprime mortgages and reaped billions by betting against the related securities, has bought about 168 million shares of Bank of America, according to a regulatory filing Wednesday.

headline.main: Paulson Fund Buys 168 Million Shares of BofA

abstract: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired Loli Wu, previously a banker at Citigroup, to be its head of transportation and infrastructure investment banking in the Americas.
snippet: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired Loli Wu, previously a banker at Citigroup, to be its head of transportation and infrastructure investment banking in the Americas.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired Loli Wu to be its head of transportation and infrastructure investment banking in the Americas.

headline.main: BofA Merrill Hires Transportation Banker From Citi

abstract: Shares of Bank of America climbed nearly 7 percent on Thursday as a new executive at the bank and a prominent hedge fund manager decided to place big bets on the company by buying up blocks of its stock.
snippet: Shares of Bank of America climbed nearly 7 percent on Thursday as a new executive at the bank and a prominent hedge fund manager decided to place big bets on the company by buying up blocks of its stock.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Bank of America climbed nearly 7 percent on Thursday as a new executive at the bank and a prominent hedge fund manager decided to place big bets on the company by buying up blocks of its stock.

headline.main: BofA Stock Jumps After Big Bets on Bank’s Fate
